data.name: XTopWindow
desc: manages the functionality specific for a top window.

methods.name: addTopWindowListener
desc: adds the specified top window listener to receive window events from this window.

methods.name: removeTopWindowListener
desc: removes the specified top window listener so that it no longer receives window events from this window.

methods.name: toBack
desc: places this window at the bottom of the stacking order and makes the corresponding adjustment to other visible windows.

methods.name: toFront
desc: places this window at the top of the stacking order and shows it in front of any other windows.
